titleStmt.title: An electronic transcription of Cambridge Genizah Fragment ENA 1487/61 (New York)
titleStmt.sponsor: Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies
Lieberman Institute; Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature

publicationStmt.pubPlace: The Maryland Institute for Technology in the Humanities

availability.licence: This work is copyright Hayim Lapin and the Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies and licensed under a .

notesStmt.note:
Fragment in the Cambridge University Libraries, Taylor-Schechter Collection. Covers Sanhedrin 7:1 - 10.
Transcription from online images of the manuscript, available at https://fgp.genizah.org. FGP nos. C96800-C96801
Dimensions: 14.4 x 11.4. Approximately 2.6 characters per cm.
EDITED BY: Hayim Lapin-->

ab.w:
מוש
The end of these traces possibly marks the left edge of written text. In this line and the next two, there do not appear to be traces of ink from this point to the left edge of the surviving parchment.

ab.label: ג'
ab.w:
ארכ
נותני
Folded piece of parchment covers characters on this line and next..

div3.note: There are traces but no readable text.

ab.label: י׳ו׳
ab.w:
פלוני
Some traces of ink are visible. כך
